lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic was given a scare in his North American hardcourt season opener but managed to prevail with a 7-5 7-6(3) victory over Luxembourg's Gilles Mueller on Wednesday to reach the third round of the Rogers Cup.
snippet: Novak Djokovic was given a scare in his North American hardcourt season opener but managed to prevail with a 7-5 7-6(3) victory over Luxembourg's Gilles Mueller on Wednesday to reach the third round of the Rogers Cup....

headline.main: Djokovic Survives Test to Reach Third Round in Toronto
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Survives Test to Reach Third Round in Toronto
